properties.name: id
properties.description: the unique id of the object

properties.name: overlap
properties.description: Overlap mean the z-index will be 1 instead of 0 so you can overlap elements

properties.name: windowed
properties.description: Windowed means the block will be surrounded by a white border of 2 * gridSize

properties.name: marginTop
properties.description: the amount of margin to be applied to the top (marginTop * gridSize)

properties.name: disableTransitionIn
properties.description: If you want to disable the default transition in for the component, for example when you start nesting block components inside of other block components and you want to have control over the transition in

properties.name: blocks
properties.description: The blocks inside this block

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The tags linked to this article

properties.name: image
properties.description: The image that will be displayed in the article teaser

properties.name: target
properties.description: The target that the teaser should link to

properties.name: paragraph
properties.description: The main paragraph displayed

properties.name: heading
properties.description: The main heading displayed

properties.name: file
properties.description: The *.mp3 file that will be played

properties.name: image
properties.description: The image linked to the audio fragment

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description about the name

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name displayed above the audio fragment

properties.name: id
properties.description: the unique id of the object

properties.name: overlap
properties.description: Overlap mean the z-index will be 1 instead of 0 so you can overlap elements

properties.name: windowed

properties.name: blocks

blocks.example:
{
    "id": "blockFilterContent",
    "data": {
        "id": "magna officia sint ullamco voluptate aliqua et velit duis aliqua sit adipisicing aliqua",
        "overlap": false,
        "windowed": false,
        "marginTop": 4,
        "disableTransitionIn": false,
        "blocks": "TODO: Array",
        "filters": "TODO: Array",
        "filterLabel": "officia id qui ipsum duis id sint labore magna irure fugiat velit",
        "endpoint": "magna est nisi elit dolore minim excepteur fugiat incididunt consequat"
    }
}

properties.name: id
properties.description: the unique id of the object

properties.name: overlap
properties.description: Overlap mean the z-index will be 1 instead of 0 so you can overlap elements

properties.name: windowed
properties.description: Windowed means the block will be surrounded by a white border of 2 * gridSize

properties.name: marginTop
properties.description: the amount of margin to be applied to the top (marginTop * gridSize)

properties.description: If you want to disable the default transition in for the component, for example when you start nesting block components inside of other block components and you want to have control over the transition in

properties.name: blocks
properties.description: The blocks inside this block

blocks.example:
{
    "id": "blockImageWithContent",
    "data": {
        "id": "mollit ullamco ex consectetur minim ut anim est eiusmod duis",
        "overlap": true,
        "windowed": true,
        "marginTop": 5,
        "disableTransitionIn": true,
        "blocks": "TODO: Array",
        "link": {
            "target": "anim culpa ea ut dolor enim adipisicing adipisicing eu ullamco",
            "type": 1,
            "deeplink": "TODO: Object",
            "label": "aliquip eiusmod amet aliquip irure ullamco ea pariatur proident ad veniam",
            "title": "sint ex amet ex incididunt est reprehenderit et deserunt dolor consectetur id"
        },
        "background": {
            "normal": "aute dolor non ad magna reprehenderit in reprehenderit minim fugiat",
            "small": "occaecat proident nulla deserunt ipsum mollit dolor anim quis mollit do minim voluptate",
            "alt": "duis minim nostrud qui dolor consectetur ut adipisicing nisi voluptate consequat"
        },
        "paragraph": "excepteur ex sunt cillum Lorem proident laborum cupidatat excepteur in cupidatat officia mollit",
        "heading": "dolor sit ut duis ullamco nisi esse nisi deserunt nisi consequat",
        "croppedImage": true,
        "alignment": 1
    }
}

blocks.example:
{
    "id": "blockMapSecondary",
    "data": {
        "id": "fugiat magna deserunt dolore ullamco et do cillum eu Lorem et in",
        "overlap": true,
        "windowed": false,
        "marginTop": 4,
        "disableTransitionIn": true,
        "blocks": "TODO: Array",
        "paragraph": "enim qui labore est Lorem consectetur culpa dolor id et ullamco id laborum amet",
        "subHeading": "fugiat magna esse cupidatat consectetur magna sint anim cillum tempor pariatur",
        "heading": "magna ea mollit excepteur quis adipisicing sint magna sit aliqua esse anim"
    }
}

properties.name: normal
properties.description: The large version of the image

properties.name: small
properties.description: The small version of the image

properties.name: alt
properties.description: The alt text of the image

properties.name: target
properties.description: The target of the link

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the link

properties.name: deeplink
properties.description: The deeplink data of the link

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label displayed in the action

properties.name: title
properties.description: The title used for accessibility

properties.name: image
properties.description: the base paths of the images in the sequences without the extension

properties.name: total
properties.description: The total amount of frames in the image sequence

properties.name: extension
properties.description: The extension of the image

properties.name: autoplay
properties.description: do we want to autoplay the sequence or want to trigger it manually
